message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose a slightly more favorable split.  Let's seal the deal and not risk losing money to inflation.
You didn't take my first offer, now it's a bit more in my favor
This back and forth is pointless. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Let's be logical and end this.
Logic is one thing, self-interest is another. I'll take a bit more, thanks
Alice, you're being unreasonable.  I'm willing to compromise, but this offer is my bottom line. Take it or leave it - we both lose if this goes on much longer.
You said that was your bottom line, but I'm willing to test that
Alice, you're playing a dangerous game. I'm offering you the same deal you offered me.  Don't let greed cloud your judgment - any further delay hurts us both.
